Identity.History: The spear is one of the most basic of human weapons. Fighting with a sharp point at the end of the pole doesnâ€™t require a lot of technology. The spear allow fighters to distance themselves from their attackers. They were originally employed by individual warriors in a fighting style similar to the quarterstaff. As time passed the spears got longer and were used in formations. Spearmen tended to be as heavily armored as possible, as carrying a long pole-arm already limits mobility. Many used large shields such as the Greek hoplon.
Identity.Tooltip: Highly effective for group-fighting vs cavalry and infantry. Excellent defense vs slings and arrows. Weak vs skirmishers and swordsmen.
